alert.note: Alert for Onondaga; Southern Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:35PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cayuga and west central Onondaga Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 535 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sennett, or near Auburn, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Onondaga, Syracuse, Auburn, Solvay, Sennett, Skaneateles, Liverpool, Marcellus, Amboy and Camillus. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 36 and 37. New York Interstate 81 between 15 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
